'''David Fries''' is the quality manager at [[Mojang Studios]] in {{w|Washington}}, U.S.

== About ==
David is a Microsoft veteran, with 15 years of experience in testing and quality assurance across 8 different products and 2 countries. He has 5 years of leadership experience, and is fluent in Japanese with certificate.<ref>https://www.linkedin.com/in/david-fries-b1372b4</ref>

Previously between September 2016 and January 2018, for 1 year and 5 months, Fries worked as a senior software engineering lead.
